name: Solaris Mission
description:
Solaris Mission is a game developed in the Coppercube engine in the endless game style. The objective is to destroy as many asteroids as possible before time runs out, which are roaming the Solar System threatening life on Earth!

The game has a low difficulty level, making it ideal for relaxing, enjoying all the space exploration in the Solar System.

The version of the game with Reshade has improved graphics, with fake HDR, better colors, and asteroids with real-time shadows!

The measurements and scales of the Solar System are in fictitious measurements.

Controls:

AWSD + Mouse = Pilot the Space Shuttle

Space/ Left mouse = shoot
